message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $850000. I believe it's a fair price considering its value and rarity.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the uniqueness of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $750000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm afraid I can't accept $750000. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll counteroffer at $800000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, considering the product's value and rarity.
